price: Ɛnnyε agodie nti na Yεbͻͻ ͻsoro ne asaase ne deε εwͻ mfimfii no.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā lāʿibīna
